Title: Data Visualization Storyteller
Job_Description:
ECS is seeking a Data Visualization Storyteller to work in our Arlington, VA office. Please Note: This position is contingent upon additional funding.
ECS is looking to hire a Data Analyst & Data Storyteller to join our Federal Practice in the DC area. This role goes beyond traditional data analysis — we are seeking someone who can transform complex data into clear, compelling narratives that drive decision-making at the executive level. You'll work closely with customers and stakeholders to develop meaningful insights, impactful data visualizations, and intuitive reporting that make data truly actionable.
